settings.heading: FAST WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
settings.text: Your candy cravings, now just a heartbeat away!

settings.heading: UNIQUE GIFT IDEA
settings.text: Discover a world of unique snacks and candies not commonly found in Europe.

settings.heading: COMPETITIVE PRICING
settings.text: Discovered a Better Deal Elsewhere? Let us know and we'll match that price.

settings.heading: WEEKLY CANDY SURPRISES
settings.text: Holly Lollies, one of the leading candy seller in the EU, constantly refreshes its selection with thousands of new candies each week, guaranteeing a continuously exciting and varied snacking experience.

settings.heading: BE THE FIRST TO TASTE THE TREND
settings.text: At Holly Lollies, we have a dedicated people who scours the globe for the latest candy crazes. From the bustling streets of Tokyo to the vibrant markets of Vietnam, if it's trending, it's coming to you first ‚Äì get ready for an exciting world of flavors!

settings.heading: ENJOY BIG DISCOUNTS FOR A SWEET CAUSE
settings.text: We regularly clear our shelves to make way for new and exciting flavors from around the world. This means you get to enjoy the most unique and trending candies at up to 70% off, ensuring nothing goes to waste while you get to explore a world of flavors at unbeatable prices.

settings.description: Each Mystery Box is a journey of sweet discoveries, offering a mix of exotic and beloved flavors. Perfect for adventurous taste buds or as a special gift, it's your chance to experience the finest selections from Holly Lollies and beyond. Unwrap surprise, taste delight!

settings.text: Dive into the playful world of Holly Lollies! We spice up your candy experience with intriguing tales, amusing facts, and clever riddles. Get ready for contests that are all about fun!

settings.headline: ‚ÄúTasting the Japanese KitKat Matcha was like a quick trip back to Japan. The variety in this box is incredible ‚Äì each candy is a new discovery. For anyone thinking about trying Holly Lollies, I say go for it. It's a world tour for your taste buds and every bite is top quality. Holly Lollies, you've got yourself a fan ‚Äì this is easily a 10/10 from me!"‚Äù
settings.name: ‚Äî Kurt Hansj√∂rg

settings.headline: ‚ÄúI‚Äôd been introduced to them through a friend, though I‚Äôd heard about them before. I‚Äôve been impressed with the range of snacks and drinks, and the effort put into each box. Even with the occasional repeat snack, it‚Äôs still always delicious. It‚Äôs worth the price, and worth the time to enjoy a big bite of exotic candies.‚Äù
settings.name: ‚Äî Alexana Weinberger

settings.headline: ‚ÄúI've had other snack boxes but, Holly Lollies is definitely my favorite. Great variety of tasty snacks, both sweet and savory. My box even included some ramen! I would definitely recommend this for anyone that wants to try exotic snacks.‚Äù
settings.name: ‚Äî Ruud de Nijs

settings.headline: ‚ÄúIt's all delicious and let's you try different flavor combinations you never would have thought of or had the chance to experience."
settings.name: ‚Äî Arjen Wesseling

settings.title: This is what our community says

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Absolutely! Our sweets know no borders. üåç‚úàÔ∏è At Holly Lollies, we're thrilled to bring a dash of joy right to your doorstep, no matter where you are on the globe. So, gear up for a flavor-filled journey, because our candies are ready to travel far and wide just for you! üç¨üåè

settings.heading: How can I track my order?
settings.text: As soon as your Holly Lollies order sets off from our candy haven, we'll pop an email your way. This isn't just any email ‚Äì it's your golden ticket to track your treasure trove of treats! üíå You'll find a tracking number inside, your key to unlock live updates on your candy's journey, all the way to your doorstep. And hey, if you need a hand or have a question, we're just a message away. Let's make this a smooth, sweet ride together! üç¨üí´

settings.heading: There's a problem with my order, what do I do?
settings.text:
Oh no, a bump in the candy road! üôÅ We're so sorry to hear that there's an issue with your order. But don't worry, our Holly Lollies team is here to turn that frown upside down! üåü

Please drop us a line at info@hollylollies.com with all the sweet details ‚Äì like your order number, what's up with the order, and any photos if you've got 'em. We're on the case to make things right and ensure your candy journey is nothing but delightful! üç≠üíå

settings.heading: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.text: With our standard shipping, your delightful Holly Lollies treats will typically arrive in 3-5 working days. üïíüç¨ And guess what? We're stirring up something even sweeter ‚Äì working hard to bring you next-day delivery soon! So, keep an eye out and get ready for a lightning-fast candy drop right at your doorstep!

settings.heading: Can I return my order?
settings.text: At Holly Lollies, we pour our heart into every package, but due to the nature of our yummy goods, we can't accept returns. If your candies aren't just right or there's a mix-up, don't fret! Just shoot us an email at info@hollylollies.com We're all ears and ready to chat about any concerns or mishaps to ensure your Holly Lollies experience stays as delightful as our treats!

settings.heading: What payment options do you offer?
settings.text: At Holly Lollies, we make checking out as easy as picking your favorite candy. Choose from a variety of payment options at checkout: Debit/Credit Card, PayPal, Apple Pay, or Google Pay. üõçÔ∏èüí≥ And don't you worry ‚Äì all your payment details are wrapped up safe and secure, just like our candies. So, go ahead and shop with complete peace of mind!

settings.heading: Got a Question or Just Want to Chat?
settings.text: We're all ears at Holly Lollies! If you've got any questions, concerns, or just some sweet feedback, we're here for you. Feel free to drop us an email at info@hollylollies.com. Our team is on standby from 9am to 5pm (GMT+2), Monday through Friday, and we aim to get back to you within 24 hours. Let's talk candy!

settings.heading: üåü Social Media Star?
settings.text: Join the Holly Lollies Family - Influencers & Creators Welcome! üéâüì∏ Whether you're a budding micro-influencer or a seasoned content creator, we're excited to team up with you! At Holly Lollies, we believe in the power of collaboration, no matter the size of your audience. Reach out to us at info@hollylollies.com and let's chat about spreading the sweet joy of our candy boxes. Don't hesitate ‚Äì we're eager to work with creators of all kinds and spread the Holly Lollies happiness as far as we can. Your voice matters, and together, we can make the world a little sweeter, one box at a time!
